content.en: Optimizing Disassembly Efficiency: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to solve different problems related to disassembly line balancing. These algorithms, such as ant colony optimization, genetic algorithms, artificial bee colony algorithms, and evolutionary algorithms, are being used to optimize the efficiency and profitability of disassembly processes. By applying these algorithms, researchers aim to find the most effective solutions for problems like sequence-dependent disassembly line balancing, stochastic disassembly line balancing, profit-oriented disassembly sequencing, and more.
content.da: Optimering af demonteringseffektivitet: Forskere har udforsket forskellige algoritmer for at løse forskellige problemer relateret til balancering af demonteringslinjer. Disse algoritmer, såsom myrekolonioptimering, genetiske algoritmer, kunstige bikoloni-algoritmer og evolutionære algoritmer, anvendes til at optimere effektiviteten og rentabiliteten af demonteringsprocesser. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer, sigter forskerne mod at finde de mest effektive løsninger på problemer som sekvensafhængig demonteringslinjebalancering, stokastisk demonteringslinjebalancering, rentabilitetsorienteret demonteringssekvensering og mere.
